body:
Release Notes

Healthcare Insights 360

This release include enhancements for Plan Intelligence and the Rates tab within Look up a Provider along with some fixes for Plan Intelligence.
Rate Analytics
Enhancements
Plan Intelligence
  • Now, you can search for rates which have an “Unspecified Place of Service” by selecting this option in the Place of Service dropdown list and view the results for unspecified place of service display within the results.
Provider Intelligence
  • Now, you can search for rates which have an “Unspecified Place of Service” by selecting this option in the Place of Service dropdown list and view the results for unspecified place of service display within the results.
  • Updated the number formatting when the negotiation type is “Percent of Charge.” The percent signs now display.
  • Now, the billing code dropdown indicates the billing codes for which the provider has contracted rates. The other billing codes will display in a grey font color and may not be selected.
Fixes
Plan Intelligence
  • Fixed the issues where the summary results weren’t matching the detail results nor in the exports.
  • Now, the export button remains visible when the user navigates from the Detail Results page and then clicks on the Specialty to the Geography tab.
  • Updated the category names in the Summary Results export for rates that do not have an associated specialty or geography. Now, on the Specialty Summary Results export, there is a category “Unclassified Specialty” and on the Geography Summary Results export, there is a category “Unknown” for these rates.
